lyrics.text:
’Eiki ke ke fakafo’ou
‘A hoku mālohi,
He koe loto vaivai au
Mo e tu’utamaki.

’Oku ou feinga ke u ma’u
‘A e angatonu,
Mo e mālohi ‘i loto
‘I he fakafo’ou.

Pea u lava atu,’Eiki
Ki he ‘Afiona,
‘I he tui ‘o e loto
Pea u fai ma’u ai pē.

Pea ‘i he’eku tui
Peau tonuhia,
Pea u ma’u ‘a e melino
Mo hoku ‘Otua.

’Eiki ko e ngāue ‘a ‘au
Ke fakafo’ou au,
Pea u tukuange ni au
Ki he ‘Afiona.

’E ‘ikai te u kei faaki
Ki he’eku ngāue,
Ka ki he ngāue ‘a ‘au
Ko e fakalelei.

‘Oku ke tu’u ‘i he vaha’a
‘O e Tamai mo au
Ko hoku fakalaloa,
‘I he’eku hia.
